title: Bnlang - Bangla Programming Vasha
description: Bnlang holo ekti programming vasha, jekhane apni Bangla, English ebong Banglish-e shohojei code likhte ebong run korte parben.
keywords: Bnlang, Bangla programming vasha, Banglish programming, Banglay code lekha, Banglay programming, Banglish coding, Bangla coding tools, Bangla programmer, Bangla programming runtime, Bangla software vasha

about.title: Somporke - Bnlang
about.description: Bnlang somporke aro janun, ekti Bangla programming vasha ja apnake Banglay, English-e, ba Banglish-e code likhte sakshom kore.

privacy.title: Goponiyota Niti - Bnlang
privacy.description: Amader goponiyota niti porun jate apni bujhte paren amra kibhabe apnar bektigoto tothyo songroho, byabohar ebong surakshito kori.

terms.title: Shortaboli - Bnlang
terms.description: Amader shortaboli porun jate apni amader platform byaboharer niyom ebong bidhimala bujhte paren.

download.title: Download - Bnlang
download.description: Download the latest version of Bnlang and start coding in your preferred language.
